title: Cinematic Fight Sound Effects Pack
description: This high-quality sound library features 1,195 sound effects, including impacts, cloth foley, whooshes, and voice clips—essential components for creating realistic and intense fighting scenes.
longDescription:
Enhance your audio production with our versatile Cinematic Fight Sound Effects Pack.


This high-quality sound library features 1,195 sound effects, including impacts, cloth foley, whooshes, and voice clips—essential components for creating realistic and intense fighting scenes.


This comprehensive collection includes dynamic punches, kicks, and blocks, as well as cloth and leather foley ranging from light to heavy. You'll also find whooshes from various materials like wooden sticks, bamboo, ropes, and cloth, along with a variety of male voice clips for attacks, breathing, pain, and death. Additionally, the pack contains body fall sounds and effects for blood and bone breaking, perfect for immersive fight scenes. Whether you're working on a film, game, or multimedia project, these sound effects will add the realism and intensity you need.


All sounds in this pack are royalty-free, allowing you to use them without any additional costs. The Cinematic Fight Sound Effects Pack is available for immediate download, making it an essential tool for any creator looking to enhance their project with top-notch sound effects.


This Cinematic Fight Sound Effects Pack is edited from Rock The Speakerbox's Sound Effects Library—a collaboration with Rock The Speakerbox and WOW Sound.


What's inside the pack?

Impacts (111): Punches, Kicks, Slaps, Body, Blocks, Bone

Whooshes (190): Rope, bamboo stick, wooden stick, metal pipe

Male VO (603): Attacks, breathes, chokes, death, pain and struggle (Mono)

Cloth Foley (160): Cloth, leather, Cloth whooshes, Leather whooshes

Misc (13): Blood squishes, Bone break and KO Ring

Bodyfall (118): Concrete, Dirt, Grass, Wood, Car Hood and more
